column5: Just cleaning the garage listening to my favorite podcasts ("Stuff you should know") and wondering if there are any fishing podcasts concerning Ontario etc.  Rather be fishing but boat sitting under a tarp up at Balsam still until Wednesday...
I used to download Outdoor Journal Radio Hour but iit's the same infomercial each week.  Orvis has good fly fishing and hunting podcasts.  Wired to Fish may have podcasts as well.
